metadata.title: CVE-2021-47380 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: HID:amd_sfh: Fix potential NULL pointer dereference devm_add_action_or_reset()can suddenly invoke amd_mp2_pci_remove() at registration that will causeNULL pointer dereference since corresponding data is not initialized yet.The patch moves initialization of data before devm_add_action_or_reset().Found by Linux Driver Verification project (linuxtesting.org).[jkosina@suse.cz: rebase]

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
